query:
UPDATE platforms SET 
  logoUrl = '/logos/langdock.jpg', 
  websiteUrl = 'https://langdock.com' 
WHERE slug = 'langdock';

UPDATE platforms SET 
  logoUrl = '/logos/mistral.png', 
  websiteUrl = 'https://mistral.ai' 
WHERE slug = 'mistral-le-chat';

UPDATE platforms SET 
  logoUrl = '/logos/neuroflash.jpg', 
  websiteUrl = 'https://neuroflash.com' 
WHERE slug = 'nele-ai' OR name LIKE '%nele%';

UPDATE platforms SET 
  logoUrl = '/logos/deepl.png', 
  websiteUrl = 'https://www.deepl.com' 
WHERE name LIKE '%DeepL%' OR slug LIKE '%deepl%';

UPDATE platforms SET 
  logoUrl = '/logos/openai.png', 
  websiteUrl = 'https://openai.com' 
WHERE name LIKE '%OpenAI%' OR name LIKE '%GPT%';

UPDATE platforms SET 
  logoUrl = '/logos/anthropic.webp', 
  websiteUrl = 'https://anthropic.com' 
WHERE name LIKE '%Anthropic%' OR name LIKE '%Claude%';

UPDATE platforms SET 
  logoUrl = '/logos/google.png', 
  websiteUrl = 'https://cloud.google.com/vertex-ai' 
WHERE name LIKE '%Google%' OR name LIKE '%Gemini%';

UPDATE platforms SET 
  logoUrl = '/logos/azure.png', 
  websiteUrl = 'https://azure.microsoft.com/de-de/products/ai-services/openai-service' 
WHERE name LIKE '%Azure%' OR name LIKE '%Microsoft%';

UPDATE platforms SET 
  logoUrl = '/logos/cohere.png', 
  websiteUrl = 'https://cohere.com' 
WHERE name LIKE '%Cohere%';

UPDATE platforms SET 
  logoUrl = '/logos/huggingface.png', 
  websiteUrl = 'https://huggingface.co' 
WHERE name LIKE '%Hugging%';

UPDATE platforms SET 
  logoUrl = '/logos/aleph-alpha.png', 
  websiteUrl = 'https://aleph-alpha.com' 
WHERE name LIKE '%Aleph%';

UPDATE platforms SET 
  logoUrl = '/logos/ai21.jpg', 
  websiteUrl = 'https://ai21.com' 
WHERE name LIKE '%AI21%';
